document.full_text: u.s. stocks edged higher on thursday, with linkedin one of the few standouts in an otherwise lackluster session as its shares doubled in their trading debut.
document.title: wall street hits resistance; linkedin soars in debut
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks edged higher on thursday, with linkedin one of the few standouts in an otherwise lackluster session as its shares doubled in their trading debut.
